attributes.action: Show all MPs in the house of commons this peition to help support Andrea Leasome
attributes.additional_details: She is a genuine and honest candidate. She understands what the majority if the public wants with brexit. She knows how to get that across with her excellent public speaking, she is firm, calm and confident and knowledgable. She is the only candidate that I personally trust to take our country forward and make it even greater. Come on use your vote for Andrea.
attributes.background: I think the vote for the next prime minister and leader of the conservative should have been a public vote so I have raised this petition to show MP's the support of the public for  Andrea Leasome. They all need to get behind her and give her their vote.
